1663.text: Commiserations to our Challengers, to Strangers On A Train.

1665.text: Good team name, as well, by the way.

1667.text: The Eggheads have done what comes naturally to them and, you know,

1670.text: your winning streak is impressive, there's no doubt about that now.

1673.text: It does mean you won't be going home with the £15,000

1676.text: so we've got a big jackpot for next time. It rolls over.

1679.text: Eggheads, well done. You're never going to lose. That's my prediction.

1684.text: Join us next time to see

1685.text: if a new team of Challengers can prove me wrong.

1688.text: £16,000 says they can't. Till then, goodbye!
